name: Ten Seconds to Midnight
description:
You are the witch of the mountain, and someone stole your broom. Luckily, you have a magic torch which can conjure a snowboard. Race to the bottom of the mountain to get your broom back!

Goal

  • Get to the bottom.
  • Pass through flames to keep your torch lit.
  • The torch will extinguish after 10 seconds.
  • Do a backflip.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrows/Stick: Steer/Walk
  • Space/X/(A): Jump
  • LShift/Z/(X): Get on/off board
